sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Search::Claim

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE invoice_date = to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE '%' = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and invoice_date = to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and invoice_date like to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , org o2, person_attribute attr WHERE i.client_id = attr.parent_id and attr.value_type between 220 and 226 and attr.value_int = o2.org_internal_id and upper(o2.name_primary) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , org o2, person_attribute attr WHERE i.client_id = attr.parent_id and attr.value_type between 220 and 226 and attr.value_int = o2.org_internal_id and upper(o2.name_primary) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , org o2, person_attribute attr WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.client_id = attr.parent_id and attr.value_type between 220 and 226 and attr.value_int = o2.org_internal_id and upper(o2.name_primary) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , org o2, person_attribute attr WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.client_id = attr.parent_id and attr.value_type between 220 and 226 and attr.value_int = o2.org_internal_id and upper(o2.name_primary) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_id = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_id like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.invoice_id = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.invoice_id like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE ib.bill_party_type in (2,3) and ib.bill_to_id = o.org_internal_id and upper(o.name_primary) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE ib.bill_party_type in (2,3) and ib.bill_to_id = o.org_internal_id and upper(o.name_primary) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and ib.bill_party_type in (2,3) and upper(o.name_primary) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and ib.bill_party_type in (2,3) and upper(o.name_primary) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , person WHERE i.client_id = person_id and upper(name_last) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , person WHERE i.client_id = person_id and upper(name_last) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , person WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.client_id = person_id and upper(name_last) = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , person WHERE i.invoice_status = ? and i.client_id = person_id and upper(name_last) like ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o WHERE i.client_id = ? AND iit.parent_id (+) = i.invoice_id AND ib.bill_id (+) = i.billing_id AND (owner_type = 1 AND owner_id = ?) AND iis.id = i.invoice_status AND to_char(o.org_internal_id (+)) = ib.bill_to_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, iis.caption, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, i.invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status, i.parent_invoice_id ORDER BY i.invoice_id desc ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.invoice_id, i.total_items, i.client_id, TO_CHAR(MIN(iit.service_begin_date), 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS service_begin_date, iis.caption AS invoice_status, ib.bill_to_id, i.total_cost, i.total_adjust, i.balance, ib.bill_party_type, TO_CHAR(i.invoice_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS invoice_date, o.org_id, i.invoice_status as status_id, i.parent_invoice_id FROM invoice_status iis, invoice i, invoice_billing ib, invoice_item iit, org o , transaction, person_attribute attr WHERE i.main_transaction = transaction.trans_id and transaction.provider_id = attr.parent_id and attr.item_name = 'UPIN' and upper(attr.value_text) = ?
